text: "Who has ever stolen something and never got caught?"
"Who has ever called in sick, even though they were completely healthy?"
"Who has ever betrayed a friend to make themselves look better?"
"Who has ever deleted messages to cover something up?"
"Who has ever secretly rejoiced in the failure of others?"
"Who has ever secretly read someone else's messages?"
"Who has ever spread a rumor?"
"Who has ever ghosted someone without saying anything?"
"Who likes to blame their own mistakes on others?"
"Who has a secret online account that no one knows about?"
"Who has ever intentionally hurt someone – emotionally or physically?"
"Who has pretended to like someone just to get something?"
"Who has secretly rejoiced when a rival has failed?"
"Who has ever intentionally eavesdropped on conversations that were not meant for them?"
"Who often thinks something different about friends than they say?"
"Who has ever done something illegal and never talked about it?"
"Who has ever faked feelings to get something?"
"Who would betray someone to get promoted?"
"Who has never told their best friend an important truth?"
"Who secretly enjoys it when others are a little afraid of them?"
"Who has ever lied about how a past relationship really was?"
"Who has ever secretly plotted a revenge plan – just in case?"
"Who would betray a friend for enough money?"
"Who has ever said 'I love you' without meaning it?"
"Who secretly loves it when others embarrass themselves?"
"Who knows exactly how to hurt with words – and uses that?"
"Who has often pretended to be completely innocent – even though they weren't?"
"Who regularly deletes their browsing history to hide things?"
"Who would rather lie than face the consequences?"
"Who has ever gossiped about a friend while pretending to be loyal?"
"Who regrets not having taken revenge?"
"Who has used others to advance themselves?"
"Who secretly feels superior to others?"
"Who carries a secret that they will never tell anyone?"
"Who finds it perfectly okay to regularly use white lies?"
"Who has intentionally made someone pay for something they themselves did?"
"Who is more manipulative than they appear at first glance?"
"Who smiles at people they actually can't stand?"
"Who has taken revenge once – and enjoyed it too much?"
"Who has intentionally broken rules just to test if they could?"
"Who doesn't show their true self in the group?"
"Who secretly longs for control rather than genuine closeness?"
"Who has ever hurt someone just to be right?"
"Who has ever used a trusted secret against someone?"
"Who has harmed someone out of jealousy?"
"Who would even lie in a game of truth or dare?"
"Who only pretends to have compassion to fit in?"
"Who has consciously flirted to manipulate someone?"
"Who secretly regrets having been too nice at some point?"
